name: Purgatory: Forest
description:
You are a mercenary!

After dying in battle, you end up in purgatory. Very soon you discover that this is not the end. Build a camp. Fight off the crowds of the dead. Summon your allies. Destroy the concentration of evil and get out.

Gameplay

Kill enemies, collect ammo and buy upgrades for the camp. Very soon your investments will begin to bring a good income. And some buildings will replenish lives.

When you accumulate enough ammunition for the assistants, they will take over the entire routine of defending the camp. With a reliable rear, you can proceed to attack the portals of evil. Do it yourself or send a special war Destroyer.

Features:
  • Pixel graphics.
  • 25 lots in the store.
  • 3 types of enemies.
  • 2 portals of evil.
  • You can save the game.
  • Completed in 30 minutes.
